mapper.sql: id, uid, code, name, type_code, en_name, table_code, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into cm_index (uid, code, name, type_code, en_name, table_code, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time) values ( #{uid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update cm_index
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type_code = #{typeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
en_name = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
table_code = #{tableCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where `code` = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
